title: How effective is your reading?
brief_description: This film is designed to help students and adults improve their reading skills. Demonstrates methods of faster reading and better understanding, emphasising at the same time the need for practice. Illustrates a number of specific reading skills, including how to read in larger thought groups, to skim, to read when in search of information, and how to read rapidly but at the same time comprehend fully.
